-e ---

𒊐 RAB raba Reif ʳhoop 𒊐 ≈ 𒈗 rabbi 𒊐 ≈ 𒄑𒄑𒈗 rab₃ Reif 𒊐𒁍 rap-pu #rappu rope 𒊐𒁀 rab-ba Reif ʳhoop

𒊐 ≈ 𒈗 rabbi ≈ regal lugal

𒄑𒊐 ĝušur₂ "clamp, clasp, neck stock"

𒐁 in 𒋀 ≈ 𒐺𒅕𒑱 ≈ 𒇽 𒐁 in 𒇽 ≈ 𒐺𒅕 ≈ 𒐺 𒐁· 𒅕 𒐁 in 𒈗 ≈ 𒃲𒇽 ≈ 𒋰𒐺𒅕 ≈ 𒊐 𒐁 in 𒈚 = 𒊐𒑲

•ğrabit gravit great

𒊐 rap راد râd "generous"

𓅆 Rabe rabû BE(COME) BIG

𒌑𒊐𒁀𒀀 urabbâ (ú-rab-ba-a)
𒌑𒊐 𒁉 urabbi (ú-rab-bi)
𒌑𒊐𒌉𒉌 urabbânni (ú-rab-ban-ni);
𒌑𒊐𒁍𒅔𒉌 urabbûinni (ú-rab-bu-in-ni);
𒌑𒊏𒁉𒄿𒈠 urabbima (ú-ra-bi-i-ma)
𒅈𒁀𒀀 arbâ (ar-ba-a)
𒅕𒁍𒌋 irbû (ir-bu-u, ir-bu-ú)
𒅕𒁍𒌑

extreme forms :

𒌅𒊐𒁀𒀭𒉌 turabbânni (tu-rab-ba-an-ni);
𒋩𒁉𒄿 šurbî (šur-bi-i);
𒌑𒊬𒁍𒌑 úšarbuú magnify besser 𓅆 rabe
𒌑𒊹𒁍𒌋 ušarbû (ú-šar-bu-u, ú-šar-bu-ú).
𒌑𒊹𒁍𒌑

𒊬𒊐𒌅 šar-rab-tu @ shar 𒊬𒊐𒌅 an offical

𒊏𒁉𒀀𒉡𒌝 ra-bi-a-nu-um rabianum ‘rabbi’ commander, a high official

𒄑𒊐 ĝušur2 "clasp, stock" ĝušur2 𒊐𒃲 ĝušurₓ 𒊐𒌉𒌉 ĝušurx 𒊐𒈤

𒊐 ≈ 𒐁𒈦𒋗 •raproš?
